QueryDefinition.Query: select e.patid, e.spno, e.epikey, e.epistart, e.epiend, e.pconsult as ProviderIdKey, cast(CONCAT(cast(e.patid as varchar), cast(e.spno as varchar)) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, CONCAT(cast(e.patid as varchar), cast(e.epikey as varchar)) as description FROM {sc}.episodes e join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND e.patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by e.patid
